hero.title: FOCUS MORE. STRESS LESS.
hero.description: As a dentist, your time is valuable, and managing your clinic can be tough.

services.p: Connecting dentists, Labs and Stores for smarter collaboration.

private.title: Private Dental Community
private.description: Secure, private space for dental professionals. Connect for advice, collaboration, or support. Compare prices and order materials in the marketplace.

plan.title: Plan Like a Pro
plan.description: Schedule tasks and appointments with ease. Manage dental materials and track supplies.

finance.title: Manage Your Finances
finance.description: Monitor material costs. Track earnings daily, weekly, or yearly. Automatic payment reminders.

opportunity.title: Top Dentist Opportunity
opportunity.description: Share expertise through online lectures. Build your reputation with high-level courses.  Monetize your knowledge with paid workshops and mentoring.

courses.title: Advanced Dental Courses
courses.description: English courses on specialized topics like Implant Dentistry, with French and Arabic subtitles. Stay updated with the latest dental trends and news.

growth.title: Business Growth Support
growth.description: Get expert help with online presence and social media, with exclusive pricing.

plans.title: Regular Updates
plans.desc: Connect with dentists and explore career opportunities with our Zirconium plan.
plans.desc2: Share cases and collaborate with dentists worldwide.

services.p: As a dental store, reaching dentists directly is the key to grow your business.

access.title: Access a Network of Active Dentists
access.description: Expand your customer base by being visible to dentists in need of quality supplies and materials.

simplified.title: Simplified Ordering
simplified.description: Dentists can easily browse your inventory, contact you, and place orders.

competitive.title: Competitive Pricing
competitive.description: Stand out with competitive prices and let dentists compare your products. Join the competition to attract new customers and boost your sales.

trust.title: Build Trust
trust.description: Strengthen relationships with dentists who will return for reliable products and services.

Plan.title: Plan Like a Pro
Plan.description: Track daily tasks and deliveries with reminders to stay organized.

management.title: Financial Management
management.description: Track expenses, manage income, and set payment reminders effortlessly.

growth.title: Business Growth Support
growth.description: Get expert help to grow your online presence with special offers.

setup.title: Quick Setup
setup.description: Start selling in less than 24 hours.

notifications.title: Real-Time Notifications
notifications.description: Get instant notifications when dentists place orders or inquire about your services, helping you respond faster and provide better customer service.
